>  Can you give some more specific examples?  Zope/Plone are a rather large and
>  large apps don't make for good example code unless a person has a week or
>  two to install and get to know the architecture first.

I pulled down the code last night... and authentication stuff can't be
buried too deep by its nature (and it's Python, which isn't too
hostile to a reading by non-Python programmers). Of course, there's
always the problem that that's the bit most likely to be *bypassed* by
a demo site, but I imagine I can find somewhere to look at it from the
new-user perspective. 'Scool.
